extendedInfo.description: Draw sticky notes on a virtual cork board or take a polaroid photo as a memo. Has multiple note color and pen choices. Quick and fun way to handle your notes.The latest update allows to put it as a home screen widget as well. Widget is not available if the app is moved to SD card.Optimized for tablets but work in any kind of device.If you find any kind of bugs please don't forget to report it to us. Crash reports are very useful as well.

reviews.title: A great idea to start off with :)
reviews.comment: I love how you can drag n organise your sticky notes. But I cant seem to find the eraser or the bin? Option to type, adding stickers n resize the sticky notes will be a great addition too :)
reviews.author: Izzah Inani

reviews.title: Widget space not fully utilized
reviews.comment: Love the app & widget but the widget has some sort of thick frame around it, a waste of real estate. ... Latest update improved the widget but My note 2 still shows cutoffs (thick frame) @ top & bottom .. 5 stars if this is fixed.
reviews.author: Mohd Taufiq Ahmad

reviews.title: Good but room for Improvement
reviews.comment: This application could benefit from having an eraser to go along with all the pen colors-.. Additionally the 4x4 widget is Really ackward looking and would look belts if it took up the whole page.. Please improve.  Otherwise: Great Application .. Super practical.
reviews.author: JOS\303\211 JIM\303\211NEZ

reviews.comment: Hate that I have to use my finger and not keyboard. Not good :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the app
reviews.comment: Exactly what i was looking for but whats different in the paid version?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No satisfaction
reviews.comment: I accidentally purchased this one . And I really would like to remove thus app, How can I have my money back?
reviews.author: Ruengsak John Palikupt

reviews.title: It forecloses 2 many times
reviews.comment: Everything I touch the pic it stops working
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Still needs work
reviews.comment: Very slow writing and cant write easy, it always looks like a 4 year old is writing a note.. besides that great idea for app.. i\'m on a galaxy s2 dual core
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I want to like this app
reviews.comment: I love the way you can move the post its around, to organize your to-do\'s graphically. Only 2 stars because the app crashes at least once a day (always two times very quickly after the other). After 2 months id had enough and uninstalled this app. I wish the develloper would deal with the crashing, but he has been most unresponsive
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy, Force Closes, Freezes Phone
reviews.comment: Program just freezes phone, when it doesn\'t it\'s so slow that you can\'t write anything. Needs a lot of work. Try Quick Notes, it works much better and there is actually room to write a note.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice idea
reviews.comment: But this should be a widget, not an app. The background is also very low res
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: To small paper
reviews.comment: To small not finger writing friendly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice, but incomplete
reviews.comment: Beautiful, easy inerface for small 2 or 3 words remainders notes. what\'s missing? At least a basic reminder function-didn\'t see it on free version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bud
reviews.comment: Still not reliable. Notes dissapear, program wont even open most of the time. Great concept, but too unreliable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very useful and looks cooler than basic memo apps
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great note app
reviews.comment: Works just like I use sickly notes. Great for small reminders.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No eraser. Keeps crashing and deleting notes.
reviews.author: Jennifer Lamb
